item.description:
Topics on the agenda:
Keeping politics and atheism separate: What can you say so that atheism isn't branded with a certain political view so that it drives people away? How about "political views don't
determine religion, nor does religion determine all a person's political
views"?

Also, Lindsay, Darrick, Fayth, and Scott went to Tom Flynn's talk Tuesday about the
demographics of non-believers. Scott will relate some relevant items from his talk.

And finally:
The Atheist Minorityâ€”In a God-centered world, atheists can feel awfully alone. Share your experiences, frustrations, and/or hope regarding how to deal with rejection, surprise, offense, and in general, feeling at home in our convictions.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the large group, some might be wearing atheistic shirts
item.name: Sunday Morning Topical Meeting--Politics, demographics, the Atheist Minority
